description: Amendments to planning permission dated 5th July 2019 (RN: 19/03571/FULL) for Variation of Condition 1 of planning permission dated 8 November 2018 (RN:18/07654/FULL) for the restoration and refurbishment of 49 Gloucester Place for continued hotel use including partial demolition and replacement of existing mansard roof and demolition and rebuild of existing rear extension at lower ground and ground floors, erection of rear ground floor extension, replacement windows, internal alterations including installation of new passenger lift, new electrical and mechanical services including new roof level air conditioning plant and creation of single opening in rear party wall connecting into rear of No51 Gloucester Place. (Site includes 51 Gloucester Place), to allow demolition and rebuild of the rear bay external wall between first and second floors. Namely, to allow alterations to existing air conditioning units.
